title: My 2014 Mac with 3.5ghz intel i7 and 16 gb ram will not download LoL
body:
My computer will not download LoL
gets to about 47% on the step 2 phase of the installation then loses all
of its downloading speed.
Can anyone help me out I'm really keen to get back into it

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Schurmo,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EpftexRa,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-14T02:23:44.989+0000)
>
> gets to about 47% on the step 2 phase of the installation then loses all of its downloading speed.

I think that there isn't enough information to help you troubleshoot your problem.
Others above gave some suggestions but check if there is any issue related to your internet service provider like download allowance or restriction, also disable the firewall during installation.

Also note that how awesome your computer is or is not doesn't tend to effect if it'll download something or not. It may effect if it can install/run it however.  Your modem itself tends to care less however.

Is it possible that you have run out of hard drive space?

Hi Schurmo,

Please try following the steps here to force a re-patch:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#mq4

Otherwise, try this:

1) Open a new Finder window, navigate to your Applications folder, and find League of Legends.app
2) Right click, Show Package Contents
3) Open Contents\League of Legends\RADS and delete the "downloads" and "solutions" folders before attempting to patch again
